question: Who is the only female badminton player from India attained the world no.1 ranking in women's singles, according to Badminton World Federation?
explanation: Saina Nehwal is the only female badminton player from India attained the world no.1 ranking in women's singles, according to Badminton World Federation. Saina Nehwal is an Indian professional badminton singles player. A former world no. 1, she has won over 24 international titles, which includes eleven Superseries titles. She has represented India three times in the Olympics, winning a bronze medal in her second appearance.
